name: Coffee Cup Cozy
description:
Cheers!

- They're made of really soft acrylic yarn and they're completely washer and dryer safe for easy coffee cleanup in case of intense hipster coffee battles. Er, 'accidental' spills. ;)

-Handmade in a smoke free home.

-I add new things to my shop weekly - visit again soon?

-If you'd like to order more then one or custom colors, please send me a message and I'll see what I can do. If I don't get back to you right away I'm probably busy carrying a coconut. 

PAYMENT METHODS: We accept Paypal, or concealed payment. Any questions, feel free to ask. :)

We ship to Worldwide via registered priority mail.
-Shipping cost US $3.75
-If you purchase another item, combined Shipping is $0.
I'll refund you for any over payment on shipping over $1.

Item will be shipped from Michigan.

Delivery time usually takes :
1-3 weeks to US
2-4 weeks to everywhere else

For more information and pictures, visit my Etsy at: http://www.etsy.com/shop/SuperShadowFrost?ref=seller_info

name: Panda Bear Skull Cap Beanie
description:
*BESTSELLER*

▲ This super soft skull cap is made from acrylic yarn and it's extremely easy to take care of, as it can be washed and dried.

▲ If you prefer to buy through Etsy: http://www.etsy.com/shop/SuperShadowFrost

PLEASE BE SURE THE ADDRESS ON YOUR PAYPAL IS CORRECT.
We ship to the paypal address. 
We are NOT responsible for any items that are lost in the post because of it.

Thanks for stopping by, you're awesome.

Because these are made on demand, please allow up to 3 weeks for delivery.
